scripts.start: npm run db:start && npm run web:start
scripts.stop: npm run web:stop && npm run db:stop
scripts.reset: npm run web:reset && npm run db:reset
scripts.restart: npm run reset && npm run start
scripts.clean:install: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd api && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ../web && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ../database && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ..
scripts.db:start: cd database && docker compose up -d && npx tsx ../scripts/wait.ts && npm run db:apply-migrations && cd ..
scripts.db:stop: cd database && docker compose down && cd ..
scripts.db:clean: cd database && docker compose down --rmi all && npm run db:reset:prisma && cd ..
scripts.db:reset: cd database && docker compose down --rmi all -v && cd ..
scripts.lint: cd api && npm run lint && cd ../database && npm run lint && cd ../web && npm run web:lint
